rows.label: qst100901_msg0001
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Whoaaa!
I almost jumped out of my skin!

rows.label: qst100901_msg0002
rows.name:
Oh! Are those...Blades?!
Sorry to bother you, but...

rows.label: qst100901_msg0003
rows.name:
You wouldn't happen to have any
Blades who can melt ice, would you?

rows.label: qst100901_msg0004
rows.name:
My Driver, Therida, is all
frozen up in ice. Don't ask.

rows.label: qst100901_msg0005
rows.name:
I can't fix it myself, so I've been looking
for someone who can.

rows.label: qst100901_msg0006
rows.name:
I mean, it's only thanks to Therida that
I'm alive.

rows.label: qst100901_msg0007
rows.name:
It's been a long journey... I can't
believe it's been five years since
I left Luxuria already.

rows.label: qst100901_msg0008
rows.name:
I came here to Gula because
I heard there were some Blades
with really awesome flame power.

rows.label: qst100901_msg0009
rows.name:
But no luck so far. What's worse, I'm
starting to feel Therida's power waning.
I'm really worried.

rows.label: qst100901_msg0010
rows.name: I don't know how to help her!

rows.label: qst100901_msg0011
rows.name:
Could you be the flame-wielding
Blade that I've been searching for
all this time?

rows.label: qst100901_msg0012
rows.name: Have I found you at last?

rows.label: qst100901_msg0013
rows.name:
Please! Please do what you can to help
Therida!

rows.label: qst100901_msg0014
rows.name:
She's at Declessa Altar Hill, near the
crevice in the Luxurian snow plain.

rows.label: qst100901_msg0015
rows.name:
I'm sorry, I'd really like to show you the
way myself.

rows.label: qst100901_msg0016
rows.name:
But being this far away from Therida,
well, it makes me very weak.

rows.label: qst100901_msg0017
rows.name:
I'll be sure to catch you up though.
Please, help her as quickly as you
can!

rows.label: qst100901_msg0101
rows.name:
Therida's at Declessa Altar Hill, near
the crevice in the Luxurian snow plain.

rows.label: qst100901_msg0102
rows.name:
I'll be sure to catch you up though.
Please, help her as quickly as you
can!
